scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.db:up: docker rm -f kanba-postgres 2>/dev/null; docker run -d --name kanba-postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=kanba -p 5432:5432 -v kanba-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data -v ./database:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d kanba-postgres
scripts.db:down: docker stop kanba-postgres && docker rm kanba-postgres
